messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello, um, I would like to exchange my Fleece Jacket. I want it in red color and with a half zipper, please. Also, I want to change my default address to my Washington DC address, but I don't want to share the address details here. Is there a way you can find it from my previous orders?
